event_text: The apprentices of the Clan are taking special training to learn how to survive in underground tunnels long-term, in the case of a siege conducted by o_c_n.

As the wind howls on the plains outside, m_c is tucked up in the cleric den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight/m_c. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.
The things {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw today, omen_list_sight/m_c... m_c isolates {PRONOUN/m_c/self} in the shifting long grass, considering what the omens foretell.
m_c went for a walk and found a cute acc_singular. It now lives in the camp, though it was hard for m_c to convince {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clanmates not to eat {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} friend.
